archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0816
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want reports to go to a case management system with tight controls around access to protect the privacy of those involved

properties.value: Comarch is to configure a case that could be registered in cases when a fraud is detected. Such a case should not be visible to everybody but only to a defined group.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
